info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 02 at 9:01PM CST until January 02 at 9:15PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CST FOR SOUTH CENTRAL UNION COUNTY IN SOUTH CENTRAL ARKANSAS AND NORTHWESTERN UNION PARISHES... At 901 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles south of Urbana to 11 miles east of Junction City to near Cooley to 7 miles south of Bernice to 7 miles northwest of Grambling to Arcadia, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bernice, Cooley, Urbana, Lawson, Spearsville, Lillie, Hillsboro, Lockhart, Aurelle, Taylorville and Catesville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CST for south central Arkansas...and north central Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
